text: Likely the wrong spot - does anyone have a Stripe CMS module?

I don’t believe that there’s one in the marketplace. I _did_ create one many years ago for a simply ‘buy’ button. I believe that I simply followed instructions on <https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-js/elements/payment-request-button>

I can’t find anything. It’s an opportunity I guess :smile: I’ll take a look at the buy button, but I’m doubtful I can have the transaction happen on the CMS then, the card details will likely need to be entered on a 3rd party page.
Actually that button is neat - I’m going to look closer.
Jotforms is pretty cool too, very simple integration. We've been doing custom integrations from scratch and it hasn't gone well historically due to just number of dev hours
Thats what I’m worried about. What is jot forms pricing like?
Actually the question should be, how do you get the form information back into HubSpot?
they have a direct integration (used to have to use a zap)
pricing depends on your # of submissions. Link to take a look: <https://www.jotform.com/pricing/>
I haven't actually used it yet (just played around with some testing stuff), but I plan to on the next Stripe project we get since the last two we did I never want to happen again
